attributes.action: Send criminals with repeated offences to Siberia to reform them by hard labour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Germans have such a programas well. We believe it is effective and saves money than keeping them in an UK jail. It solves the problem of jails getting over-crowded and removes criminals from our society.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
